com.volmit.catalyst.api

Interface ShadowChunk


  • public interface ShadowChunk
    Represents a shadow of an actual chunk. Modifications are tracked, and used for converting to fake-chunk packets. Supports skylight, blocklight, biomes, and block changes
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Flush all pending modifications into packets to send

    • Method Detail

      • isFullModification

        boolean isFullModification()
        Check if the next flush is a full chunk section or not
        Returns:
        true if the next chunk packet will be a full send

      • rebase

        void rebase()
        Rebase the shadow of the real chunk, essentially syncing this shadow to the real chunk. This dumps any non-flushed modifications

      • rebaseSection

        void rebaseSection(int section)
        Rebase the shadow section from the real chunk section.
        Parameters:
        section - the section to rebase

      • queueSection

        void queueSection(int section)
        Queue the given chunk section for resending

      • queueBiomes

        void queueBiomes()
        Queue biomes for resending

      • getSource

        org.bukkit.Chunk getSource()
        Get the source chunk
        Returns:
        the source this shadow is... shadowing

      • flush

        List<Object> flush()
        Flush all pending modifications into packets to send
        Returns:
        the packets to send

      • flushSection

        List<Object> flushSection(int section)
        Flushes only the given section
        Parameters:
        section - the section to flush.
        Returns:
        returns the section to flush. If the chunk has to send a full column, it will return a full flush instead. If nothing needs to be flushed in that section, an empty list is returned.

      • getEntireMask

        int getEntireMask()
        Get the bitmask of the entire chunk. Due to performance costs, this bitmask may reflect non-flushed (pending) modifications if a modification creates a new chunk section.
        Returns:
        the bitmask

      • getModifiedMask

        int getModifiedMask()
        Get the bitmask of the non-flushed modified sections
        Returns:
        the modified bitmask

      • setSkyLight

        void setSkyLight(int x,
                 int y,
                 int z,
                 int light)
        Set skylight Does nothing if this chunk doesnt have a sky (dimension is nether or end)
        Parameters:
        x - chunk relative x
        y - chunk relative y
        z - chunk relative z
        light - the light level

      • setBlockLight

        void setBlockLight(int x,
                   int y,
                   int z,
                   int light)
        Set blocklight
        Parameters:
        x - chunk relative x
        y - chunk relative y
        z - chunk relative z
        light - the light level

      • setBlock

        void setBlock(int x,
              int y,
              int z,
              org.bukkit.Material material)
        Set a block
        Parameters:
        x - chunk relative x
        y - chunk relative y
        z - chunk relative z
        material - the material (assumes data = 0)

      • setBlock

        void setBlock(org.bukkit.Location location,
              org.bukkit.Material material,
              int data)
        Set a block
        Parameters:
        location - the world relative location (throws exception if outside chunk)
        material - the material
        data - the data.

      • setBlock

        void setBlock(org.bukkit.Location location,
              org.bukkit.Material material)
        Set a block
        Parameters:
        location - the world relative location (throws exception if outside chunk)
        material - the material (assumes data = 0)
